name: ease
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: ease
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to make or become less severe, difficult, unpleasant, painful, etc.

example.eg: To ease the problem of overcrowding, new prisons will be built.
example.egtrans: 为了缓解监狱里人满为患的情况，将修建新的监狱。

example.eg: These pills should ease the pain.
After the arrival of the United Nations soldiers, tension in the area began to ease.
example.egtrans: 联合国维和士兵到达后，这个地区的紧张局势开始得到缓解。

dsense.name: ease
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to move or to make something move slowly and carefully in a particular direction or into a particular position
trans_examp.trans_cn: （使）小心缓慢地移动；（使）缓缓移动

example.eg: She eased the key into the lock, anxious not to wake anyone.
example.egtrans: 她小心翼翼地把钥匙插入锁孔，生怕惊醒任何人。

example.eg: I eased myself out of the chair.
example.egtrans: 我慢慢地从椅子上站起身。

name: ease
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: the state of experiencing no difficulty, effort, pain, etc.
trans_examp.trans_cn: 容易，不费力；舒适，安逸，自在

example.eg: She won the 400 metre race with ease.
example.egtrans: 她轻松赢得了400米赛跑的冠军。

example.eg: The doors are extra-wide for ease of access (= so that people can get in without difficulty).
example.egtrans: 门都是加宽的，出入方便。

example.eg: She soon put/set me at ease (= made me relaxed) .
example.egtrans: 她很快消除了我的紧张情绪。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: If someone, especially a soldier, is at ease, they are standing with their feet apart and their hands behind their back.
